classes.name: Other
classes.description: The set of pixels representing any roofing material which does not belong to one of the predefined classes (e.g., chimneys, heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems, etc.)..

classes.name: __ignore__
classes.description: The set of pixels representing the background (i.e., areas which have been masked out of the training data).

classes.name: __invalid__
classes.description: The set of pixels representing ambiguous areas which clearly do not belong to a building roof (e.g., the buffer regions around the roof masks, mask regions containing background or other building parts due to data distortion or misalignment issues, etc.).
